http://www.property24.com.ph/apartment-and-condominium-for-rent-in-cebu-city-110508522

Studio Condominium Unit near St. Theresa's College and Major Hospitals
Fully furnished studio unit at Cityscape 2 along Juana Osmeña St. This is across the former Baseline Restaurant. Walking distance to St. Theresa's College, Redemptorist Church, major banks, Robinson's Fuente, Robinsons Cybergate, Perpetual Succour Hospital, Chong Hua Hospital, Cebu Doctors' University Hospital and Cebu Provincial Capitol Building. 2 minutes ride to Ayala Mall and 5 minutes ride to SM City Cebu. This practically close to everything.

Josephine Englis
